CustomField.formula: IF ((OR(ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c, "XYZ"), ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c, "XYZ"),ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c, "XYZ"),ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c, "XYZ"),ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c, "XYZ"),ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c, "XYZ"))), IF(OR($User.UIThemeDisplayed == 'Theme4d', $User.UIThemeDisplayed == 'Theme4t'), HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus__MergeDocument?id="&Id, IMAGE("/resource/Apttus__Button_MergeDocument", "Merge Documents"),"_self"), HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus__MergeDocument?id="&Id, IMAGE("/resource/Apttus__Button_MergeDocument", "Merge Documents"),"_self")), NULL)
CustomField.label: MergeDocument_Custom
